entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 9:13 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023
